meanings.definition: A blouse worn over another garment.
meanings.sent1: She wore an overblouse over her dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The overblouse added a stylish layer to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The overblouse decided to take a break and hang out on the coat rack.
meanings.sent4: Her overblouse was like a protective shield against the chilly wind.
meanings.sent5: The bright red overblouse stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To wear a blouse over another garment.
meanings.sent1: She likes to overblouse her tops for a trendy look.
meanings.sent2: Remember to overblouse your shirt before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to overblouse the curtain but failed hilariously.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to overblouse the truth, hiding the real story.
meanings.sent5: The music overbloused the noise of the traffic outside.
